subprocess_flow.description: Initiate the world simulation engine to simulate early tectonic movements. This involves setting up the initial parameters for plate tectonics, including the number of plates, their sizes, and their initial directions of movement. The simulation will run for a defined period, generating a preliminary layout of the world's crust.
subprocess_flow.purpose: To generate the initial layout of the world's crust through simulated tectonic activity.
subprocess_flow.scope: Simulating the initial tectonic movements and generating a preliminary crust layout.

step_risks_and_controls.control: Implement error handling and logging mechanisms
Calibrate simulation parameters based on real-world data

subprocess_flow.description: Based on the initial crust layout, define the boundaries of continents and oceans. This involves identifying areas of high elevation that will form continents and areas of low elevation that will form oceans. The process includes defining the shapes and sizes of the continents and oceans, ensuring they align with the geological plan.
success_criteria: Continent and ocean boundaries are defined
subprocess_flow.purpose: To define the boundaries of continents and oceans based on the initial crust layout.
subprocess_flow.scope: Defining the shapes and sizes of continents and oceans.
end_conditions: Continent and ocean boundaries are defined

step_risks_and_controls.control: Adjust simulation parameters to create more realistic shapes
Adjust tectonic activity to balance landmass distribution

subprocess_flow.description: Simulate the formation of various landforms and geological features, such as mountains, valleys, and plateaus. This involves simulating erosion, weathering, and other geological processes that shape the land over time. The simulation will generate a diverse range of landforms, ensuring they are functional and aesthetically pleasing.
subprocess_flow.purpose: To simulate the formation of various landforms and geological features.
subprocess_flow.scope: Simulating erosion, weathering, and other geological processes.
triggers: Continent and ocean boundaries are defined

step_risks_and_controls.control: Adjust simulation parameters to create more realistic shapes
Adjust simulation parameters to create a more diverse range of landforms

subprocess_flow.description: Strategically place essential minerals and resources throughout the world. This involves simulating the formation of mineral deposits and resource distribution based on geological processes. The placement of resources will be strategic, ensuring they are accessible and distributed in a way that supports the development of ecosystems and future civilizations.
success_criteria: Resources are accessible and strategically distributed
subprocess_flow.purpose: To strategically place essential minerals and resources throughout the world.
subprocess_flow.scope: Simulating the formation of mineral deposits and resource distribution.

step_risks_and_controls.control: Adjust simulation parameters to balance resource distribution
Ensure resources are placed in accessible locations
